revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TRENDnet |model=TEW-673GRU |revision=A.v |upc=710931600445 |ean= |asin=B003C2SZQE |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/28/2010 |manuf_country=China |manuf=Cameo |manuf_model=WLAN-2202 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=XU8TEW673GRU,NHPWLAN2202 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR7161 |cpu1_cspeed=680 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6405D |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=ProMOS |ram1_model=V58C2256164SCI5 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9220 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9223 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366SR |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=LCD |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} [http://www.trendnet.com/downloads/list_subcategory.asp?SUBTYPE_ID=1382 Downloads page] The device is near identical to the [[D-Link DIR-825 rev B1]].
The principal difference between the two is the screen :- the 673GRU has one, the DIR-825 does not. TRENDnet's FCC ID is XU8TEW673GRU, Cameo's FCC ID is NHPWLAN2202 ===Forum treads=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/trendnet/tew-673gru On '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=76797 On '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:53410-11 On '''iXBT''' forums] Per the above DD-WRT forums post, the device will work with the DIR-825 firmware :with the last byte of the firmware changed to an ASCII 1 instead of a 0
